ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: An implementation of many measures for the assessment of the stability of feature selection. Both simple measures and measures which take into account the similarities between features are available, see Bommert (2020) <doi:10.17877/DE290R-21906>.

An implementation of many measures for the assessment of the stability of feature selection. Both simple measures and measures which take into account the similarities between features are available, see Bommert (2020) <doi:10.17877/DE290R-21906>.

name: r-stabm
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.2.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-stabm
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/stabm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/stabm/stabm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 18ee4877d9197e642e78b6098d39e1c449d93456f0d1a9b386fcfe2b708b54ef

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix >=1.5_0
    - r-checkmate >=1.8.5
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-matrix >=1.5_0
    - r-checkmate >=1.8.5

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('stabm')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('stabm')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://bommert.github.io/stabm/, https://github.com/bommert/stabm
  license: LGPL-3.0-only
  summary: An implementation of many measures for the assessment of the stability of feature
    selection. Both simple measures and measures which take into account the similarities
    between features are available, see Bommert (2020) <doi:10.17877/DE290R-21906>.
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/LGPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
